title: 2 Easy Ways to Withdraw Money From Wisely to a Bank Account

steps.title: Launch the myWisely app.
steps.content: Launch the myWisely app. This looks like a white w with a purple background. Wisely is a mobile banking app, similar to Chime . You'll be able to transfer money , get paid earlier, and earn cash-back rewards. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your username and password to do so now. You can also visit https://www.mywisely.com/app/main/login in a web browser.

steps.title: Tap or click the arrows in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap or click the arrows in the top-right corner. This looks like two opposing arrows. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap or click Transfer Money.
steps.content: Tap or click Transfer Money . You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Enter your routing number and account number.
steps.content: Enter your routing number and account number . If your bank has a mobile app or website , you can easily find this information under your checking or savings account details.

steps.title: Complete the transfer.
steps.content: Complete the transfer. Make sure the routing and account numbers are correct, and then tap or click Transfer . Fees are dependent on your account type and cardholder agreement. You can easily find this information in your myWisely account portal. Transfers can take up to 3 business days to process.

steps.title: Launch the myWisely app.
steps.content: Launch the myWisely app. This looks like a white w with a purple background. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your username and password to do so now. You can also visit https://www.mywisely.com/app/main/login in a web browser. Transfers using a debit card is only available to users who have the "Funds" transfer fee. This should be listed in your "List of Fees".

steps.title: Tap or click the arrows in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap or click the arrows in the top-right corner. This looks like two opposing arrows.

steps.title: Tap or click Transfer Money.
steps.content: Tap or click Transfer Money . You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Enter your debit card number.
steps.content: Enter your debit card number. This is the 16-digit number on the front of your debit card.

steps.title: Complete the transfer.
steps.content: Complete the transfer. Make sure the number is correct, and then tap or click Transfer . Fees are dependent on your account type and cardholder agreement. You can easily find this information in your myWisely account portal. Transfers should be processed within 30 minutes.
